  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 04

Words 301-400

  1. bone
    The dog buried the bone in the garden.

  2. book
    I borrowed a book from the library.

  3. boot
    She wore a pair of black boots.

  4. border
    They crossed the border into another country.

  5. bored
    He felt bored during the long meeting.

  6. boring
    The movie was so boring that I fell asleep.

  7. born
    She was born in a small village.

  8. borrow
    Can I borrow your pen for a moment?

  9. boss
    My boss asked me to finish the report by tomorrow.

  10. both
    Both of my friends are coming to the party.

  11. bother
    Sorry to bother you, but can you help me?

  12. bottle
    He drank a bottle of water after the run.

  13. bottom
    The keys are at the bottom of the bag.

  14. bowl
    She served the soup in a large bowl.

  15. box
    The gift was wrapped in a red box.

  16. boy
    The boy is playing in the park.

  17. boyfriend
    Her boyfriend gave her a beautiful necklace.

  18. brain
    The brain is an important part of the body.

  19. branch
    The bird is sitting on a tree branch.

  20. brand
    This is my favorite brand of chocolate.

  21. brave
    The brave firefighter saved the child.

  22. bread
    She bought a loaf of bread from the bakery.

  23. break
    Let’s take a short break before continuing.

  24. breakfast
    I had eggs and toast for breakfast.

  25. breast
    The baby was fed with breast milk.

  26. breath
    Take a deep breath and relax.

  27. breathe
    It’s hard to breathe in this smoky room.

  28. breathing
    His breathing became steady after the exercise.

  29. bride
    The bride looked beautiful in her white dress.

  30. bridge
    They walked across the old wooden bridge.

  31. brief
    He gave a brief explanation of the plan.

  32. bright
    The sun is very bright today.

  33. brilliant
    She had a brilliant idea for the project.

  34. bring
    Please bring your notebook to the meeting.

  35. broad
    The road is broad enough for two cars.

  36. broadcast
    The news was broadcast live on television.

  37. broken
    The window was broken during the storm.

  38. brother
    My brother is two years older than me.

  39. brown
    She has brown eyes and dark hair.

  40. brush
    Don’t forget to brush your teeth before bed.

  41. bubble
    The children were playing with soap bubbles.

  42. budget
    We need to stick to our budget for the trip.

  43. build
    They plan to build a new school in the area.

  44. building
    The tall building is visible from far away.

  45. bullet
    The bullet hit the target during practice.

  46. bunch
    She gave me a bunch of flowers for my birthday.

  47. burn
    Be careful not to burn yourself on the stove.

  48. bury
    They decided to bury the treasure in the sand.

  49. bus
    I take the bus to work every morning.

  50. bush
    A rabbit jumped out from behind the bush.

  51. business
    He started a small business selling handmade goods.

  52. businessman
    The businessman traveled to another city for a meeting.

  53. busy
    She is always busy with work during the week.

  54. but
    I wanted to go, but I was too tired.

  55. butter
    She spread butter on her toast.

  56. button
    Press the button to start the machine.

  57. buy
    I want to buy a new phone next month.

  58. by
    The book was written by a famous author.

  59. bye
    She waved and said, “Bye!” as she left.

  60. cable
    The TV is connected to the cable network.

  61. cafe
    We had coffee at a small cafe near the park.

  62. cake
    She baked a chocolate cake for the party.

  63. calculate
    Can you calculate the total cost of these items?

  64. call
    I will call you when I get home.

  65. calm
    Try to stay calm during the interview.

  66. camera
    He used a camera to take pictures of the sunset.

  67. camp
    They set up camp near the river.

  68. campaign
    The campaign aims to raise awareness about the issue.

  69. camping
    We went camping in the mountains last weekend.

  70. campus
    The university campus is very large and beautiful.

  71. can1
    I can help you with your homework.

  72. can2
    He opened a can of soda.

  73. cancel
    They decided to cancel the meeting due to bad weather.

  74. cancer
    She is raising money for cancer research.

  75. candidate
    Each candidate gave a speech during the event.

  76. cannot
    I cannot believe how fast time flies.

  77. cap
    He wore a red cap to protect himself from the sun.

  78. capable
    She is capable of handling the project on her own.

  79. capacity
    The hall has a seating capacity of 500 people.

  80. capital
    Paris is the capital of France.

  81. captain
    The captain of the team gave an inspiring speech.

  82. capture
    The photographer managed to capture the perfect moment.

  83. car
    He bought a new car last week.

  84. card
    She sent me a birthday card in the mail.

  85. care
    Please take care of yourself while traveling.

  86. career
    He is planning to change his career next year.

  87. careful
    Be careful when crossing the street.

  88. carefully
    She carefully placed the vase on the table.

  89. careless
    His careless mistake caused a lot of trouble.

  90. carpet
    The carpet in the living room is soft and warm.

  91. carrot
    She added a carrot to the soup for extra flavor.

  92. carry
    Can you help me carry these boxes upstairs?

  93. cartoon
    The children watched a funny cartoon on TV.

  94. case
    In this case, we need to act quickly.

  95. cash
    I prefer to pay with cash instead of a card.

  96. cast
    The director chose a talented cast for the movie.

  97. castle
    They visited an old castle during their vacation.

  98. cat
    The cat is sleeping on the couch.

  99. catch
    Can you catch the ball if I throw it?

  100. category
    This book falls into the fiction category.
